plot outline: Trigger happy cop ACP Shankar discovers he shares a past with the deceased son of the house he is stuck in during Hindu Muslim riots - and thus begins his journey of questioning his methods and the real meaning of God, peace, law and truth.
title: Tamassu
plot: Trigger happy cop ACP Shankar discovers he shares a past with the deceased son of the house he is stuck in during Hindu Muslim riots - and thus begins his journey of questioning his methods and the real meaning of God, peace, law and truth.
